title: "Semiconductor Stocks Soar on Further Potential Chip Export Curbs on China"
excerpt: "Trade war between the U.S. and China takes another leap as the Biden administration is trying to restore the semiconductor industry back to its home ground away from China, according to the WSJ. The Biden administration plans to impose new controls on the exports of advanced chips to China that are used in artificial-intelligence (AI) calculations and several other applications."
